name: Boulder Time
description: ...3... You're a boulder. And this is war. Soon you'll be catapulted into the sky ...2... Make it as far as you can without hitting the enemy's endless barrage of explode-o-boxes. ...1... Use your BOULDER-TIME (tm) to slow things down when things get hectic! Fire! {{ left/right }} - drift left and right {{ space }} - use boulder time to slow things down
